body:
I think repeating a (self explanatory) accessor method call four times is still more readable than a template method. A casual reader might be confused into thinking that `RegisterGraphRequest`, `DeregisterGraphRequest`, `RunGraphRequest` etc. have a common superclass, whereas this templating only works because they share a coincidentally-named member.

Please switch `FindWorkerSession()` to taking a string.
